name: Calculator
description: Present the user a series of prompts using Java Script. The program will take in the user's reposes and use them to process variest actions.

name: Form Submission
description: Present the user a form to fill out. Before form submission the form should be validated and display any errors to the user to correct before submission is allowed.

name: Fetch Request
description: Provided the user the ability to view an education history table. This program uses Java promises to retrieve an file and read into an list of college degrees.

name: Texas Skylines
description: Display a series of images that shows depicts a city skyline from the past and present. When the user hovers over the image it will change to the an image of the cities present skyline.
